snippet.title: Chinese hackers attacked New York Times computers for four months
snippet.description: ...The New York Times reports that its internal network wasattackedby Chinese hackers over the last four months. The e-mail accounts of several reporters who worked on a story critical of the family of Chinese prime ministerWen Jiabaowere infiltrated, and the passwords of every single New York Times employee were stolen.
